Attributes.description: Development of a variety of techniques and approaches to painting. Emphasis on developing a strong paint vocabulary as well as acquiring knowledge of historical and contemporary issues in painting.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: (A score of 72% or higher in two of VISA 110, VISA 180, VISA 183.)
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 17:00
